name: nextjs-fullstack-app-template
description: A template for creating a production-ready fullstack Next.js application with: React Bootstrap and Clerk using Cypress and GitHub Actions

scripts.test: npm run test:coverage:jest && npm run test:coverage:component && npm run test:coverage:e2e
scripts.test:cy:run: CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:5100 CYPRESS_NODE_ENV=test cypress run --browser chrome --env coverage=true
scripts.test:db:init: NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=test npm run seed:run
scripts.test:ci: npm run pretest && npm run test:coverage:jest && npm run test:coverage:component && npm run test:db:clear && npm run test:db:init && npm run test:build && npm run test:start & npm run test:wait-on && npm run test:cy:run && npm run posttest
scripts.test:coverage:prepare-folders: npm run pretest && (mkdir .nyc_output || true) && (mkdir reports || true)
scripts.combine:reports: npx nyc merge reports && mv coverage.json .nyc_output/out.json
scripts.report:combined: npx nyc report --reporter lcov --reporter text --report-dir coverage
scripts.test:coverage:component: NODE_ENV=test cypress run --component --browser chrome --env coverage=true && cp cypress-coverage/coverage-final.json reports/from-cypress-component.json
scripts.test:coverage:e2e: cypress run --browser chrome --env coverage=true && cp cypress-coverage/coverage-final.json reports/from-cypress.json
